system.description: At 20th level, the common love shared between you and your allies fuels your combat prowess. Whenever a creature takes the Help action within the range of your Sacred Aura after initiative is rolled, they add an additional [[/r 2d8]] to your next divine smite damage, up to a maximum number of bonus damage dice equal to twice your Charisma modifier (minimum of [[/r 2d8]]). You lose all of this bonus damage if you do not use it by the time combat ends.
